title: Velo’s Predictions for 2024: Cavendish Tour de France Record, Van Empel’s Rise, a Further Wait for Ineos
content:
Bettering Merckx, a new Dutch super talent, and a once-mighty team trying to find its way back. These are Shane's tips for 2024.

Read the full article at Velo’s Predictions for 2024: Cavendish Tour de France Record, Van Empel’s Rise, a Further Wait for Ineos on Velo.
